text: Desh Bandhu Gupta (1938 â€“ 26 June 2017) was an Indian billionaire businessman. He was born in Rajgarh, Alwar, Alwar State, British Raj (now in Rajasthan, India). He was known for being the founder and chairman of Lupin Limited, a multinational pharmaceutical company. In 2015, Forbes estimated Gupta's net worth at $7.2 billion, making him the 254th richest person in the world. Gupta died in Mumbai, India on 26 June 2017, aged 79. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Indian businesspeople Category:Billionaires
title: Desh Bandhu Gupta
